node.title: Child dies following water incident off Napier coast
node.description: A young child has died after getting into difficulty in the sea off Napier.
node.content:
["A young child has died after getting into difficulty in the sea off Napier.", "", "
Marine Parade, Napier Photo: 123RF
", "Police said in a statement that the child died in a water-related incident off Marine Parade, Napier South.", "Emergency services were called about 3.30pm, but despite four police officers and a member of the public attempting to rescue the child, they tragically died.", "The member of public was taken to hospital for assessment.", ""No one expects a visit to the beach to end this way," Eastern District commander superintendent Jeanette Park said.", ""This is a devastating outcome for this family and our thoughts and aroha are with them.", ""I also want to acknowledge the Police staff and member of the public who went into the water to rescue the child.", ""This is not the outcome they had wanted and we will ensure they are also provided with support."", "Police said they were providing support to the child's family.", "They would make enquiries on behalf of the Coroner to understand what occurred.", "A rāhui is expected to be put in place."]
